QuestData.Title: Coup de Grace
QuestData.Description: Look at that. Lirastrasza's destroying them!$B$BThere are still drakes that she's downing that need finishing off, $n. We don't want the stinking Twilight healers to get them back up into the air.$B$BTime for a little Coup de Grace.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver a Coup de Grace on 5 Twilight Skyterrors.
QuestData.CompletionText: That's all? I think that you can finish off a few more.
QuestData.RewardText: Good thing that you and Warlord Krogg made friends with the red dragons.
